碫字的基本解释

碫
duàn
磨刀石；也泛指石头：“兵之所加，如以碫投卵者，虚实是也。”
磨砺：“耕者碫乃锄，樵者砺乃斧。”
锻打用的石砧。

碫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duàn］
［《廣韻》丁貫切，去换，端。］
(1)锻铁用的砧石。亦泛指石块。
(2)磨砺，修凿。

碫字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　碫； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页833第15
【廣韻】丁貫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】都玩切，同鍛。○按《說文·殳部·段註》：椎物也。金部鍛註：小冶也。意實相足。《詩·大雅》：取厲取鍛。毛傳云：鍛，石也。鄭箋云：鍛，石所以爲鍛質也。言取鍛厲斧斤之石。《陸德明·音義》則云：本又作碫。是碫與鍛通用無疑。《正字通》因《說文》石部有碬無碫，必欲以碬爲碫字之譌，且斥《正韻》碫同鍛爲誤，非也。

碫字的起名意思

暂无。

coarse stone
Basic explanation of words
coarse stone
duàn
Sharpening stone; also generally refers to stone: "A soldier's addition, such as a person who throws an egg with a beech, is true or false."
Grinding: "The tiller is a hoe, and the woodcutter is an axe."
Stone anvil for forging.
coarse stone
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duàn］
["Guangyun" Ding Guanqi, change, end. ]
(1) Anvil for wrought iron. Also refers to stones in general.
(2) Sharpen and repair.
coarse stone
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　碫; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 833 15
[Guang Yun] Ding Guanqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] All play cutting, same forging. ○According to "Shuowen·Panbu·Duan Annotation": Zhuwu also. Jinbu Forging Note: Xiaoye also. Full of meaning and reality. "Poetry·Daya": Forge hard and forge. Mao Chuanyun: Forging, stone also. Zheng Jianyun: Forging, so stone is forging quality. Words take the stone of forging a sharp axe. "Lu Deming·Sound and Meaning" says: This book is also made of 碫. It is undoubtedly common to forging and forging. "Zhengzitong" because the stone part of "Shuowen" has no chrysanthemum, it is necessary to use chrysanthemum as the chrysanthemum of the word chrysalis.
